overview:
As the Chief Technical Officer of Wavelength Media, Doug has never ending exposure to the forefront of the digital landscape. This exposure paired with a deep technical understanding of digital platforms, has given him the insights and knowledge to help organizations leverage their expertise and products to drive business.

Among Doug’s greatest strengths is ability to adapt to new and upcoming technology. This ability to consume technology while understanding it’s real-world application, has positioned Wavelength as a consultancy that believes in “the right tool for the right job” - delivering products and services that are custom tailored to the needs of each individual client.

Doug’s expertise has progressed as quickly as digital technology itself. As an original designer of Flash interactive videos and web applications, Doug’s eye for design paired with programming expertise made him sought-after talent in the emerging interactive world. As the web and mobile platforms evolved, he became a leader and advocate of dynamically driven websites, content management systems, and mobile optimized platforms. This expertise and passion has positioned Doug as an expert in the real world application of marketing technology in the digital channel.

Doug received his Bachelor of Arts degree from Kansas State University and enjoys spending his time as a contending marathon runner, bicyclists and triathlete.
